about_the_game:
Your name is Johnny the Pirate and you have lost an arm and a leg. However, that does not stop you from proving that you can still JUMP!!! Due to your injuries your jumps are unstable but you must reach the top and become the RandoJumper!

Experience the obstacle course:
  • Made out of various different obstacles from different cultures
  • Made out of various different obstacles that MOVE!!!!
  • While jumping at 7 m/s.
  • While jumping at 8 m/s.
  • While jumping at 9 m/s.
  • While jumping at 10 m/s.
  • While jumping at 11 m/s.
  • While jumping at 12 m/s.
  • While jumping at 13 m/s.
  • While jumping at 14 m/s.
  • While jumping at 15 m/s.
  • While jumping at 16 m/s.
  • While jumping at 17 m/s.
  • While jumping at 18 m/s.
  • While jumping at 19 m/s.
  • While jumping at 20 m/s.
  • While jumping at 21 m/s.
  • While jumping at many more speeds!

May the jumps be with you!
detailed_description:
Your name is Johnny the Pirate and you have lost an arm and a leg. However, that does not stop you from proving that you can still JUMP!!! Due to your injuries your jumps are unstable but you must reach the top and become the RandoJumper!

Experience the obstacle course:
  • Made out of various different obstacles from different cultures
  • Made out of various different obstacles that MOVE!!!!
  • While jumping at 7 m/s.
  • While jumping at 8 m/s.
  • While jumping at 9 m/s.
  • While jumping at 10 m/s.
  • While jumping at 11 m/s.
  • While jumping at 12 m/s.
  • While jumping at 13 m/s.
  • While jumping at 14 m/s.
  • While jumping at 15 m/s.
  • While jumping at 16 m/s.
  • While jumping at 17 m/s.
  • While jumping at 18 m/s.
  • While jumping at 19 m/s.
  • While jumping at 20 m/s.
  • While jumping at 21 m/s.
  • While jumping at many more speeds!

May the jumps be with you!
name: RandoJumper

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: A precision platformer of a pirate who is out there to prove himself that he can reach the top!
